means: 压缩某物使其少占空间或时间

sentence.Network_en: Mars was visible, dead in the centre of the telescope.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以看得见火星，就在望远镜的正中央。

sentence.Network_en: Like a telescope it has a curved mirror to collect the sunlight.
sentence.Network_cn: 和望远镜一样，它有一个曲面镜可以积聚阳光。

sentence.Network_en: The space telescope has taken the clearest pictures ever of Pluto.
sentence.Network_cn: 太空望远镜拍摄到了迄今为止最清晰的冥王星的照片。

list.abs: reflecting stereoscope 反射立体镜reflecting telescope 反射望远镜reflection altimeter 反射测高计
红外望远镜（infrared telescope）接收天体的红外辐射的望远镜。外形结构与光学镜大同小异，有的可兼作红外观测和光学观测。
望远镜英文_百度知道 ... sighting telescope 瞄准镜 solar telescope 太阳望远镜 solid schmidt telescope 立体施密特望远镜.
在物理常用的英文单词_百度知道 ... refracting angle 折射棱角 refracting telescope 折射望远镜 refraction 折射.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Italian telescopio or modern Latin telescopium, from tele- 'at a distance' + -scopium (see -scope)

entry.def: A telescope is a long instrument shaped like a tube. It has lenses inside it that make distant things seem larger and nearer when you look through it.

example.ex: It's hoped that the telescope will enable scientists to see deeper into the universe than ever before.
example.tran: 人们希望望远镜能使科学家看到比以往更遥远的宇宙深处。

means.word_mean: 1. a magnifier of images of distant objects

sentences.sentence: "my hiking sticks telescope and can be put into the backpack"
"the novel was telescoped into a short play"

stems_affixes.type_exp: =far,表示"远[引申为电,电从远方来]"

stems_affixes.word_buile: tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+gram写,画→n.电报
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+graph写→用电写→电报
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+meter测量→远测量→遥测仪
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+phone声音,话机→n.电话,电话机 v.打电话
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+scope看→看远方→望远镜
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+vis看+ion表名词→看远方,通过电视看→电视
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+graph写→用电写→电报
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+phone声音,话机→n.电话,电话机 v.打电话
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+scope看→看远方→望远镜
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+vis看+e→看远方,通过电视等看

sentences.en: She resolved to make a telescope.

jushi.english: She resolved to make a telescope.
In 1609,Galileo improved the telescope and used it to study the stars and planets.
jushi.chinese: 伽利略于1609年改进了望远镜,用它研究恒星和行星。
